## Before you start

Please confirm:
- [ ] I am running **Home Assistant 2025.2.1** or later
- [ ] I have installed the integration and **restarted Home Assistant**
- [ ] I have added a device via **Settings > Devices & Services > Add Integration > Voice Satellite Card**
- [ ] I have the [Voice Satellite Card](https://github.com/jxlarrea/Voice-Satellite-Card-for-Home-Assistant) installed
- [ ] I have confirmed my Assist pipeline works independently (e.g., via the Assist dialog in the HA sidebar)
